name: BubbleBlast · NerdMan
description:
Compete with friends and other people around the world!

Simply let the bubbles explode in the right sequence to defeat the evil lab and save the world. Try to be as fast as you can.

* Endless game fun for in-between
* Beautiful cartoon graphics
* Simple game principle

BubbleBlast is a Minigame that is part of the Nerdman Social Game. Download the full version for free!
